title: 125: How to Make Better Choices with Ryan Levesque
description:
How do you make better choices?

Our life is a reflection of our choices we’ve made up to this point. From what we choose to eat, who we’re spending time with, what we think, and what we do, adds up to where we are.

Have you ever given a thought about how you make these choices?

I have my friend, Ryan Levesque, with me today, and he’s the bestselling author of ASK, and he has a brand new book called, CHOOSE.

In this episode, we’re going to talk about how you can ask better questions to make better choices to change your life.

** Do you want to stay up to date with every new episode and get my brand new Kwik Brain Accelerator Program? Go to www.KwikBrain.com/podcast to get instant access. **
